content: That's really helpful, thanks! I'll make sure to pace myself and stay comfortable during the ride. Since I'll be riding on rural roads, I'll also keep an eye out for wildlife and farm animals. Speaking of which, I remember participating in a charity cycling event, Pedals for a Purpose, where our team raised over $2,000 for a local children's hospital, and we had to navigate through some rural roads with horse farms. It was a great experience, and I'm looking forward to this ride as well.
